Document.TEXT:
Golf Rounds Sink In October.
Posted by SGB Media | Nov 30, 2017 | Apparel , Footwear , SGB Updates , Sports/Fitness , Update | 0 | According to Golf Datatech, golf rounds played were down 4.1 percent in October 2017 compared to October 2016. The biggest declines came in West North Central, 17.0 percent; East North Central, 14.6 percent; South Central, 9.3 percent; and Mountain 3.0 percent. Gains were seen in Mid Atlantic, 2.8 percent; South Atlantic, 0.9 percent; New England, 8.7 percent; and Pacific, 7.0 percent. For the year-to-date period, golf rounds played are off 2.2 percent.
